humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the patient has no regional lymph node metastasis, as indicated by 'pNO' in the report. The report also mentions that 0 out of 11 lymph nodes were positive for metastasis. Based on the rules provided, this corresponds to an N0 stage, which indicates no metastatic carcinoma in regional lymph nodes. This is further supported by New Rule 11, which states that N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The pathology report indicates that 7 regional lymph nodes were negative for malignancy (0/7), and no distant metastasis was found. Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
